title: Mind Wide Open: Your Brain and the Neuroscience of Everyday Life
description: A tour of today's cutting-edge brain research challenges readers to reevaluate the essence of human personality and fate, explaining how the brain predicts and processes events, describing breakthroughs in biofeedback technology, citing the sources of creativity and ideas, and offering insight into brain neurochemistry. 50,000 first printing.
author: Steven Johnson
